about_the_game:
Emplacement is an innovative and strategic turn-based game that combines elements of tile-laying and combat. The game is played on an isometric board, with each player taking turns to place tiles in an attempt to gain the upper hand over their opponent. The game is similar to chess in that players must think ahead and anticipate their opponent's moves in order to succeed.



As the game progresses, players can use their units to engage in combat with the other player's units. The main objective of the game is to defeat the other player by killing their king. The king is a special unit that is placed on the board at the start of the game, and should be protected by other units. The game is won by the player who successfully kills the other player's king.



Emplacement is a challenging and entertaining game that requires players to think creatively and strategically. The game's isometric perspective and turn-based gameplay add depth and excitement to the experience, making it a must-play for fans of strategy games. The game's simple yet engaging mechanics make it accessible to players of all ages and skill levels, making it an excellent choice for both casual and hardcore gamers alike.

short_description: Emplacement is a turn-based strategy game. Build up a floating metropolis while destroying your enemies. Place your tiles across the map while strategically building up your army & economy. Come up with strategies similar to chess to become the best!
